CustomField.description: Visual Indicator. Logic: if Lead Status is Open and Created date is 3 days before today (“now”) then Yellow, if Lead is open and Created date is 5 days before today (“now”) then Red, else Green.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(CreatedDate <= NOW() - 3.00, CreatedDate > NOW()-5.00, ISPICKVAL(Status, "Open")), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015C0000002tp5j", "Yellow Circle"), IF(AND(CreatedDate <= NOW() - 5.00, ISPICKVAL(Status, "Open")), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015C0000002tp5i", "Red Circle"), IMAGE("servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015C0000002tp5h", "Green Circle")))
CustomField.label: Visual Status
